verses.verse: And at that time <S%H6256><s%> shall Michael <S%H4317><s%> stand up <S%H5975><s%>, the great <S%H1419><s%> prince <S%H8269><s%> which standeth <S%H5975><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy people <S%H5971><s%>: and there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>, such as never was since there was a nation <S%H1471><s%> even to that same time <S%H6256><s%>: and at that time <S%H6256><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> shall be delivered <S%H4422><s%>, every one that shall be found <S%H4672><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%>.

And many <S%H7227><s%> of them that sleep <S%H3463><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> shall awake <S%H6974><s%>, some to everlasting <S%H5769><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, and some to shame <S%H2781><s%> and everlasting <S%H5769><s%> contempt <S%H1860><s%>.

And they that be wise <S%H7919><s%> shall shine <S%H2094><s%> as the brightness <S%H2096><s%> of the firmament <S%H7549><s%>; and they that turn many <S%H7227><s%> to righteousness <S%H6663><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.

But thou, O Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, shut up <S%H5640><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%>, and seal <S%H2856><s%> the book <S%H5612><s%>, even to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>: many <S%H7227><s%> shall run to and fro <S%H7751><s%>, and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall be increased <S%H7235><s%>.

Â¶ Then I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%>, and, behold, there stood <S%H5975><s%> other <S%H312><s%> two <S%H8147><s%>, the one <S%H259><s%> on this side <S%H2008><s%> of the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> on that side of the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>.

And one said <S%H559><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, which was upon <S%H4605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>, How long shall it be to the end <S%H7093><s%> of these wonders <S%H6382><s%>?

And I heard <S%H8085><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, which was upon <S%H4605><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>, when he held up <S%H7311><s%> his right hand <S%H3225><s%> and his left hand <S%H8040><s%> unto heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and sware <S%H7650><s%> by him that liveth <S%H2416><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> that it shall be for a time <S%H4150><s%>, times <S%H4150><s%>, and an half <S%H2677><s%>; and when he shall have accomplished <S%H3615><s%> to scatter <S%H5310><s%> the power <S%H3027><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, all these things shall be finished <S%H3615><s%>.
And I heard <S%H8085><s%>, but I understood <S%H995><s%> not: then said <S%H559><s%> I, O my Lord <S%H113><s%>, what shall be the end <S%H319><s%> of these things?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Go thy way <S%H3212><s%>, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>: for the words <S%H1697><s%> are closed up <S%H5640><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> till the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>.

Many <S%H7227><s%> shall be purified <S%H1305><s%>, and made white <S%H3835><s%>, and tried <S%H6884><s%>; but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall do wickedly <S%H7561><s%>: and none of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall understand <S%H995><s%>; but the wise <S%H7919><s%> shall understand <S%H995><s%>.

And from the time <S%H6256><s%> that the daily <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice shall be taken away <S%H5493><s%>, and the abomination <S%H8251><s%> that maketh desolate <S%H8074><s%> set up <S%H5414><s%>, there shall be a thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he that waiteth <S%H2442><s%>, and cometh <S%H5060><s%> to the thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

But go thou thy way <S%H3212><s%> till the end <S%H7093><s%> be: for thou shalt rest <S%H5117><s%>, and stand <S%H5975><s%> in thy lot <S%H1486><s%> at the end <S%H7093><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%>.
